title: GET_ENTITY_MAPDATA_OWNER
content:
0xF6B815C5// GetEntityMapdataOwner
BOOL GET_ENTITY_MAPDATA_OWNER(Entity entity, int* mapdataHandle, int* entityHandle);Parameters:entity: An entity owned by map data.mapdataHandle: The output map data handle.entityHandle: The output entity handle.Returns: True if successful, false if not.Retrieves the map data and entity handles from a specific entity.
This function supports SDK infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
codeBlocks:
// GetEntityMapdataOwner
BOOL GET_ENTITY_MAPDATA_OWNER(Entity entity, int* mapdataHandle, int* entityHandle);

local entity = PlayerPedId()
-- Example usage for GET_ENTITY_MAPDATA_OWNER
GetEntityMapdataOwner(entity, 0, 0)
